alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; East Carteret; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, west central Hyde, southeastern Beaufort, central Carteret and Pamlico Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alligator Lake to near Maribel to near Croatan. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, South River, Sladesville, Swindell Fork, Scranton, Merrimon, New Holland, Pamlico Beach, Lowland, Florence, Janeiro, Grantsboro, Great Neck, Riverdale, Rose Bay, Whortonsville, Croatan, Maribel and Nc Pamlico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; East Carteret; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
